selected_skills.name: extract_text_from_image
selected_skills.purpose: Extract ages of Alice and Bob from the image.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use this skill to obtain the text from the image that contains the ages of Alice and Bob.

selected_skills.name: calc_numeric
selected_skills.purpose: Compute the age gap between Alice and Bob.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use this skill to subtract the age of Alice from the age of Bob to find the age gap.

selected_skills.name: format_final
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use this skill to format the computed age gap into the required answer format.
